Celebrate the true joy of giving this Christmas! Shuga has planned 12 days of exciting giveaways for you to surprise your friends & family with! Yes, we want to deliver rewards & happiness to your loved ones! What better way than to spend Christmas giving back to the ones you cherish. Afterall, the more you give, the more you receive.

All giveaways will only be revealed on the day itself so do stay tuned to this page!

Here’s how:

1. When the daily giveaways are open, sign up with a loved one in mind.
Both you and your loved one have to be Shuga users! Please participate with the same mobile number that you have registered with Shuga app. If you have yet to download Shuga app, you are clearly missing out! Download now.
2. Winners will be revealed on our FB and IG page (@shugasg) the following morning.
Your loved one will also be notified by us! This is the best time to catch them by surprise!
3. Giveaways close at 10pm SGT daily!
Set your daily alarm notifications now!
14 Dec
Universal Studios Singapore Season Passes (1 Pair)

Unwind at Universal Studios Singapore with your loved one! With thematic rides and characters we grew up with, we guarantee you unforgettable memories with the USS Season Pass.

15 Dec
Drive conversion with on the go rewards.Qool Weekend Staycation at Quincy Hotel! (worth SGD388)

Ideal for spending quality time with your loved one as you enjoy All-Day light refreshments or soak up in a romantic bath with a complimentary bath bomb/bubble bath from LUSH Fresh Handmade Cosmetics.

Sweeten your stay experience by joining their Couple Art Jamming session, or simply cuddle up and catch a movie by their glass-encased pool on the 12th floor on Saturday nights. Breakfast included!

16 Dec
NOX Dine in the Dark 3-Course Mystery Set Menu with 2 glass wine tasting for 2 pax (worth SGD280)

Shuga presents you with a feast this X’mas! Take a plunge into an intriguing new world of mystery and sensation you have never experienced before, and join us on a culinary journey through taste, smell, touch and sound, in total darkness.

This is definitely more than just fine dining. It is going to be a mind-altering sensory experience.

17 Dec
Spa Retreat for 2 at Spa Rael (worth SGD620)

Spa Rael is an award winning spa group located at One° 15 Marina Club and Goodwood Park Hotel. We are giving away a pair of the following treatments (choice of one)!

Body Aromatherapy

Inspired by the healing art of aromatherapy, this body massage & scrub are designed to improve the physical & emotional state

Bespoke Face Spa

Designed specifically with your skin’s well-being in mind. Treatment boosts outstanding skin rejuvenation effects that cover the essential needs of every skin type

*Spa Rael is a proud partner of Shuga! Enjoy an additional 2.1% Shuga rebate when you book with Spa Rael!

18 Dec
Weekend Staycation at Yotel (worth SGD225)

Enjoy a Premium Queen Cabin room at the all new futuristic Yotel located in Orchard! Their smart-bed is definitely something worth mentioning… you can adjust it to your desired height while watching non-stop entertainment on their Smart-TV. To make things perfect, we are even throwing in breakfast for you and your loved one! Now this is an absolutely smart way to wind down with your loved one.

19 Dec
F45 10 Sessions Package for 1 pax

We thought this would be a perfect way to drown your guilt after putting on all the Christmas calories! We can’t emphasize more on the importance of keeping healthy. F45 is a great way to challenge yourself physically and mentally.

Participating outlets: Siglap, Tiong Bahru, Amoy Street and River Valley.

20 Dec
2D1N Staycation at Warehouse Hotel (worth SGD418)

Located at Robertson Quay, The Warehouse Hotel undoubtedly has a rich history and heritage behind it.

We are giving away a night’s stay at the Warehouse Loft, which is located at the top floor with soaring, double-high ceilings! Each loft is fitted with a king-sized bed and ensuite bathroom. Enjoy a quiet evening with your loved one and wake up to breakfast for 2, proudly provided by Shuga!

21 Dec
$500 Scoot Vouchers

The perfect gift for Christmas! Take a break this season and scoot away with your loved one. Seeking a beach getaway? A bustling city for the shopaholic? Needless to say more, the choice is yours.

Voucher is valid for all Scoot operated flights sold on flyscoot.com. Terms and Conditions apply.

22 Dec
Weekend High-Tea for 2 at The Landing Point (worth SGD 125)

Fancy a date with good food and great ambience? Shuga got you covered! Sink your teeth and hearts into an Afternoon Tea Set for 2!

The Landing Point at The Fullerton Bay Hotel Singapore is the gourmet’s home away from home. Stretching along an elegant indoor promenade paved with bespoke marble mosaics and gold hues, it’s the perfect venue to see and be seen.

23 Dec
88,000 Shuga (worth SGD 440)

This is personally our favourite giveaway. You can literally do anything with Shuga, that’s why!

Shuga points never expire, and you can exchange for vouchers (Capitaland, NTUC, Cold Storage, Starbucks/Sephora Gift Cards, just to name a few). Best of it all, you can cash your Shuga points out and they go right into your bank account. It’s that easy.

As a Shuga user, there are so many ways you can earn Shuga across a marketplace! Earn Shuga each time you spend with our partners, or just by visiting their shops. Shuga is also given when you snap any receipts or through Shuga goals. Last but not least, there is Shuga High whereby thousands of Shuga are given out every Wed!

24 Dec
2D1N Staycation at Fullerton Hotel

It’s Christmas Eve! And it’s only going to get better… Soak in the sights at night from where you are going to be at. We are giving away a 1night stay at the Fullerton Hotel, Courtyard Room! Inclusive of buffet breakfast for 2 at Town Restaurant!

25 Dec
A trip to ‘nowhere’ with Shuga

Merry Christmas! We hope you have enjoyed all 12 days of our curated giveaway! To end this off with a blast, here’s $1,000 of Chan Brothers travel vouchers for you to take your loved one by surprise!

There is simply no time to lose, start planning your next destination now!

By participating in this giveaway, all participants are to be bound by the following terms and conditions.

Terms and Conditions:
  1. Only one entry will be accepted per person. Multiple entries from the same person will be disqualified.
  2. Shuga reserves the right the make changes on this page without prior notice
  3. If we are unable to reach or contact a winner within 7 days, we will arrange for the same giveaway to another winner
  4. Pictures used are for illustration purposes only
  5. Winners will be notified of all details including T&Cs of third party prizes. Shuga is not responsible for inaccurate prize details supplied to winners by any third party connected with this competition.
